body:
Any developments on C.F.D. or F.E.A? What engine are you going to use?  p.s. FYI I would like to use FEA for stress analysis and for cast flow analysis. SIMPLE ANALYSIS which runs through GH.. So you can choose a low number of nodes to get a rough picture of stress, or flow.... i.e.: Fill object with connected nodes and then make connections physical.

And or... connect nodes together with physics to make a liquid.... 

Could kangaroo help- or is this a different approach?
